name: Shinigami: Yet Another Flappy Bird Clone
name_original: Shinigami: Yet Another Flappy Bird Clone
description:
Hi there! This is a very simple Flappy-Bird-like game. You control the head of the Headless Horseman, that is trying to return to its owner. That´s pretty much it.

All sounds and sprites are not my own (since I am very bad at drawing and composing) and their creators are listed in the "Credits" tab.

It´s the first project I completed on my own, so don´t be too harsh ;)  That said, I do appreciate any feedback on the game. Have fun!
